content.rendered:
With a holistic range of technology services within one or more technology domains, FFI delivers managed outsourcing solutions by providing a predefined set of services to the clients. Embracing the Remote IT and Multi-Geo IT Procurement trend, bring Procurement Outsourcing Market in IT Consulting. FFI handles the entire project outsourcing for T&M Staffing, Payroll Processing, Replacement, Training & offboarding

  • Bandwidth to focus on core business
  • Enhanced competitiveness and efficiency
  • Mitigated risk
  • Reduced labour costs
  • Expedited implementation due to experienced staff on short notice
